00022 /* 
00023  * client to pg
00024  * */
00025 int PGStartupPacket3(int fd,PACK *pa){
00026     char *newbuf;
00027     size_t pv_len;
00028     uint32 pv, v;
00029 
00030     if(pa->pack == NULL) {
00031         d_log("pack calloc error !\n");
00032         return -1;
00033     }
00034 
00035     pv_len = Socket_Read(fd, pa->pack, sizeof(uint32));
00036     if(pv_len == sizeof(uint32)){
00037         memcpy(&pv, pa->pack, sizeof(uint32));
00038 
00039         pv = ntohl(pv);
00040         newbuf = realloc(pa->pack, pv);
00041         if(newbuf){
00042             pa->pack = newbuf;
00043         }else {
00044             printf("errr-----\n");
00045             return -1;
00046         }
00047 
00048         pv_len = Socket_Read(fd, pa->pack+sizeof(uint32), pv-sizeof(uint32));
00049 
00050         if(pv_len == (pv-sizeof(uint32))){
00051             /*  v=0;
00052             memcpy(&v, pa->pack+sizeof(uint32), sizeof(uint32));
00053             printf("pv major: %d pv minor:%d\n", ntohl(v)>>16, ntohl(v)&0x0000ffff);
00054             printf("param: %s\n", pa->pack+sizeof(uint32)+sizeof(uint32));
00055             printf("pv:%d\n", pv);*/
00056             return pv;
00057         }
00058         return -1;
00059     }
00060     return -1;
00061 }

00064 /* 
00065  * ===  FUNCTION  ======================================================================
00066  *         Name:  resolve_slot
00067  *  Description:  
00068  * =====================================================================================
00069  */
00070 SESSION_SLOTS *resolve_slot(const char *buf){
00071     char *p;
00072     SESSION_SLOTS *_slot;
00073     uint32 v;
00074 
00075     if(buf == NULL)return NULL;
00076     p = buf; 
00077 
00078     _slot = (SESSION_SLOTS *)calloc(1, sizeof(SESSION_SLOTS));
00079     _slot->backend_fd = 0;
00080 
00081     memcpy(&v, p+sizeof(uint32), sizeof(uint32));
00082     _slot->major = ntohl(v)>>16;
00083     _slot->minor = ntohl(v)&0x0000ffff;
00084 
00085     p +=  sizeof(uint32)+sizeof(uint32);
00086 
00087     while(*p)
00088     {
00089         if (!strcmp("user", p))
00090         {
00091             p += (strlen(p) + 1);
00092             _slot->user = strdup(p);
00093                 
00094             if (!_slot->user)
00095             {
00096                 free(_slot);
00097                 return NULL;
00098             }
00099         }
00100         else if (!strcmp("database", p))
00101         {
00102             p += (strlen(p) + 1);
00103             _slot->database = strdup(p);
00104             if (!_slot->database)
00105             {
00106                 free(_slot->user);
00107                 free(_slot);
00108                 return NULL;
00109             }
00110         }
00111 
00112         /*
00113          * From 9.0, the start up packet may include
00114          * application name. After receiving such that packet,
00115          * backend sends parameter status of application_name.
00116          * Upon reusing connection to backend, we need to
00117          * emulate this behavior of backend. So we remember
00118          * this and send parameter status packet to frontend
00119          * instead of backend in
00120          * connect_using_existing_connection().
00121          **/
00122         else if (!strcmp("application_name", p))
00123         {
00124             p += (strlen(p) + 1);
00125             _slot->application_name = p;
00126         }
00127 
00128         p += (strlen(p) + 1);
00129     }
00130 
00131     return _slot;
00132 }               /* -----  end of function resolve_slot  ----- */

00135 int AuthPG(const int bfd,const int ffd, SESSION_SLOTS *slot, ssize_t no){
00136     char *newbuf,  *_apack, *_drtmp, *_hdrtmp;
00137     size_t totalsize, offset,  total_size, cmd_size;
00138     uint32 total;
00139     int rfd, wfd, q=0;
00140     MSGFORMAT *_mf;
00141     int type=1, isSELECT, mem_len;
00142     HDR *_hdr;
00143     ULIST *_ulist;
00144     SLABPACK *mem_pack;
00145     
00146     #define FB(type) \
00147         do \
00148         { \
00149         if((type)==0){  \
00150             rfd = ffd;  \
00151             wfd = bfd;  \
00152         }else{          \
00153             rfd = bfd;   \
00154             wfd = ffd;  \
00155         }             \
00156         } while (0)
00157 
00158     #define STORE()         \
00159     do                      \
00160     {                                           \ 
00161         if(isSELECT == 0 && _hdr){                    \
00162             _drtmp = realloc(_hdr->dr, _hdr->drl+totalsize);    \
00163             if(_drtmp){                                         \
00164                 _hdr->dr = _drtmp;                              \
00165                 memcpy(_hdr->dr+_hdr->drl, _apack, totalsize);  \
00166                 _hdr->drl += totalsize;                         \
00167             }else{                                              \
00168                 freeHdr(_hdr);                                  \
00169                 return -1;                                      \
00170             }                                                   \
00171         }                                                       \
00172     }while (0)
00173 
00174     FB(type);
00175       
00176     if(slot->backend_fd != 0) return -1;
00177     
00178     _hdr = NULL;
00179     _ulist = NULL; 
00180     isSELECT = -1;
00181 
00182     FB(1);
00183     
00184     auth_loop:
00185         _apack = calloc(1, sizeof(char));
00186         cmd_size = Socket_Read(rfd, _apack, sizeof(char));
00187 
00188         if(cmd_size != sizeof(char)) {            
00189             free(_apack);
00190             _apack = NULL;
00191             return -1;
00192         }
00193 
00194         newbuf = realloc(_apack, sizeof(char)+sizeof(uint32));
00195         
00196         if(newbuf){
00197             _apack = newbuf;
00198         } else{
00199             free(_apack);
00200             _apack = NULL;
00201             return -1;
00202         }
00203         /* printf("ask: %c\n", *_apack);*/
00204 
00205         total_size = Socket_Read(rfd, _apack+sizeof(char), sizeof(uint32));
00206 
00207         if(total_size != sizeof(uint32)){
00208             free(_apack);
00209             _apack = NULL;
00210             return -1;
00211         }
00212         total = 0;
00213         memcpy(&total, _apack+sizeof(char), sizeof(uint32));
00214 
00215         total = ntohl(total);
00216 
00217         //if(totalsize < total){
00218             totalsize = sizeof(char)+total;
00219             newbuf = realloc(_apack, total+sizeof(char));
00220         
00221             if(newbuf){
00222                 _apack = newbuf;
00223             } else{
00224                 free(_apack);
00225                 _apack = NULL;
00226                 return -1;
00227             }
00228         //}
00229         Socket_Read(rfd, _apack+sizeof(char)+sizeof(uint32), total-sizeof(uint32));
00230 
00231         Socket_Send(wfd, _apack, totalsize);
00232 
00233         if ( slot->backend_fd == 0 && *_apack != 'p') {
00234             MSGFORMAT *_mf;
00235             _mf = (MSGFORMAT *)calloc(1, sizeof(MSGFORMAT));
00236             _mf->format = (char *)calloc(1, totalsize);
00237 
00238             memcpy(_mf->format, _apack, totalsize);                    
00239             _mf->format_len = totalsize;
00240            
00241             if(slot->tail == NULL){
00242                 slot->tail = slot->head = _mf;
00243 
00244             }else{    
00245                 slot->head->next = _mf;
00246                 slot->head = _mf;
00247             }   
00248         }
00249         
00250         switch ( *_apack ) {
00251             case 'R':   
00252 
00253                 if(total==8){
00254                     FB(1);
00255                 }else
00256                     FB(0);
00257                 
00258                 goto free_pack;
00259 
00260             case 'p':   
00261                 FB(1);
00262                 goto free_pack;
00263             case 'S':
00264                 FB(1);
00265                 goto free_pack;
00266             case 'K':
00267                 FB(1);
00268                 goto free_pack;
00269             
00270             case 'E':
00271                 printf("E\n");
00272 
00273                 if(_hdr){
00274                     freeHdr(_hdr);
00275                     _hdr = NULL;
00276                 }
00277                 if(_ulist){
00278                     freeUList(_ulist);
00279                     _ulist = NULL;
00280                 }
00281 
00282                 return -1; 
00283             case 'Q':
00284                 FB(1);
00285 
00286                 _hdrtmp = _apack+sizeof(char)+sizeof(uint32);                    
00287                 isSELECT = findSQL(_hdrtmp, total);
00288                 if(isSELECT == 0){
00289                     mem_pack = (SLABPACK *)calloc(1, sizeof(SLABPACK));
00290                         
00291                     hkey(_hdrtmp, total, mem_pack);
00292                     
00293                     if(mem_pack->len > 0){                        
00294                         Socket_Send(wfd, mem_pack->pack, mem_pack->len);
00295                         free(mem_pack->pack);
00296                         
00297                         FB(0);
00298                     }else{
00299                         _hdr = hdrcreate(); 
00300                         
00301                         _hdr->keyl = total;
00302                         _hdr->key = (char *)calloc(total, sizeof(char));
00303                         memcpy(_hdr->key, _hdrtmp, total);
00304                         _hdr->stime = get_sec(); 
00305                         _hdr->flag = H_TRUE;                    
00306                     }
00307 
00308                     free(mem_pack);
00309                 }else{
00310                     _ulist = (ULIST *)calloc(1, sizeof(ULIST));
00311                     _ulist->keyl = total;
00312                     _ulist->key = calloc(total, sizeof(char));
00313                     memcpy(_ulist->key, _hdrtmp, total);
00314                     _ulist->utime = get_sec();
00315                     _ulist->flag = H_TRUE;
00316 
00317                 }
00318 
00319                 goto free_pack;
00320             case 'T':
00321                 FB(1);
00322                 if(isSELECT == 0 && _hdr){
00323                     _hdr->dr = (char *)calloc(totalsize, sizeof(char));
00324                     memcpy(_hdr->dr, _apack, totalsize);
00325                     _hdr->drl = totalsize;
00326                 }
00327 
00328                 goto free_pack;
00329             case 'D':
00330                 FB(1);
00331                 STORE();
00332 
00333                 goto free_pack;
00334             case 'C':
00335                 FB(1);
00336                 STORE(); 
00337                 goto free_pack;
00338             case 'Z':
00339                 FB(0);
00340                 STORE();
00341 
00342                 if(isSELECT == 0 && _hdr){
00343                     addHdr(_hdr, no);
00344                 }
00345                 if(_ulist)
00346                     addUlist(_ulist, no);
00347                 goto free_pack;
00348             case 'X':
00349                 free(_apack);                
00350                 _apack = NULL;
00351                 return 0;
00352                 
00353             default:    
00354                 //printf("any:%c\n", *_apack);
00355                 break;
00356         }                               /* -----  end switch  ----- */
00357     
00358     free_pack:
00359         if(_apack)free(_apack);
00360         _apack = NULL;
00361         goto auth_loop;
00362 }

00365 /* 
00366  * ===  FUNCTION  ======================================================================
00367  *         Name:  findSQL
00368  *  Description:  
00369  * =====================================================================================
00370  */
00371 int findSQL (  const char *sql, int len ){
00372     const char *p = sql;
00373     char u[] = "SELECT";
00374     char l[] = "select";
00375     int i;
00376 
00377     if(len < strlen(l)) return -1;
00378 
00379     while (*p == ' ' || *p == '\t' || *p == '\r' || *p == '\n'){  
00380         p++;          
00381     } 
00382     
00383     for(i=0; i<strlen(l); i++, p++){
00384         if(*p != u[i] && *p != l[i]){
00385             return -1;
00386         }       
00387     }
00388 
00389     return 0;
00390 }               /* -----  end of function findSQL  ----- */

00392 int PGExchange(const int bfd,const int ffd, SESSION_SLOTS *slot){
00393     char *newbuf, ask, *pack;
00394     size_t psize, totalsize, offset, cmd_size, total_size, name_size, encry_size;
00395     uint32 total, encry;
00396     int rfd, wfd, q=0;
00397     MSGFORMAT *_mf;
00398     int type=1;
00399     
00400     /* if(cache_hast_table == NULL){
00401         cache_hast_table = hcreate(8);
00402     }*/
00403 
00404     #define FB(type) \
00405         do \
00406         { \
00407         if((type)==0){  \
00408             rfd = ffd;  \
00409             wfd = bfd;  \
00410         }else{          \
00411             rfd = bfd;   \
00412             wfd = ffd;  \
00413         }             \
00414         } while (0)
00415 
00416     FB(0);
00417     
00418     pack = calloc(1, sizeof(uint32));
00419     totalsize = sizeof(uint32);
00420     for(;;){
00421         psize = 0;
00422         
00423         /*  if(newbuf){
00424                 pack = newbuf;
00425         } else return -1;*/
00426         //printf("pro start--\n");
00427         if(type == 1)
00428         cmd_size = Socket_Read(rfd, &ask, sizeof(char));
00429         else
00430         cmd_size = Socket_Read(rfd, &ask, sizeof(char));
00431 
00432         if(cmd_size != sizeof(char)) {            
00433             //printf("error cmd_size:%d ask %c \n",cmd_size, ask);
00434             free(pack);
00435             return -1;
00436         }
00437 
00438         if(ask == 'X')return 0;
00439        // printf("ask: %c\n", ask);
00440         if(type == 1)    
00441         total_size = Socket_Read(rfd, pack+psize, sizeof(uint32));
00442         else
00443         total_size = Socket_Read(rfd, pack+psize, sizeof(uint32));
00444 
00445         if(total_size != sizeof(uint32)) return -1;
00446         memcpy(&total, pack, sizeof(uint32));
00447 
00448         total = ntohl(total);
00449         psize += total;
00450 
00451         if(totalsize < total){
00452             totalsize = total;
00453             newbuf = realloc(pack, totalsize);
00454         
00455             if(newbuf){
00456                     pack = newbuf;
00457             } else return -1;
00458         }
00459         if(type == 1)
00460         name_size = Socket_Read(rfd, pack+sizeof(uint32), total-sizeof(uint32));
00461         else
00462             name_size = Socket_Read(rfd, pack+sizeof(uint32), total-sizeof(uint32));
00463 
00464         /*  if(slot->backend_fd != 0){
00465             if(q !=0 || ask == 'Q'){ 
00466                 Socket_Send(wfd, &ask, sizeof(char));
00467                 Socket_Send(wfd, pack, psize);
00468                 //free(pack);
00469             }
00470         }else{*/
00471         if(type == 1){
00472             Socket_Send(wfd, &ask, sizeof(char));
00473             Socket_Send(wfd, pack, psize);
00474         }else{
00475             Socket_Send(wfd, &ask, sizeof(char));
00476             Socket_Send(wfd, pack, psize);
00477         }
00478         /*  }
00479        printf("pack:%s\n", pack+sizeof(uint32));
00480         
00481         if ( slot->backend_fd == 0 && ask != 'p') {
00482             MSGFORMAT *_mf;
00483             _mf = (MSGFORMAT *)calloc(1, sizeof(MSGFORMAT));
00484             _mf->format = (char *)calloc(1, sizeof(char)+psize);
00485 
00486             memcpy(_mf->format, &ask, sizeof(char));
00487             memcpy(_mf->format+sizeof(char), pack, psize);                    
00488             _mf->format_len = sizeof(char)+psize;
00489            // free(pack);
00490             if(slot->tail == NULL){
00491                 slot->tail = slot->head = _mf;
00492 
00493             }else{    
00494                 slot->head->next = _mf;
00495 
00496                 slot->head = _mf;
00497             }   
00498         }*/
00499 
00500         switch ( ask ) {
00501             case 'R':   
00502 
00503                 if(total==8){
00504                     type = 1;
00505                 }else
00506                     type = 0;                
00507                 FB(type);
00508                 break;
00509 
00510             case 'p':   
00511                 type = 1;
00512                 FB(type);
00513                 /*  
00514                 if(slot->passwd == NULL){
00515                     slot->passwd = (char *)calloc(1, sizeof(char));
00516                     memcpy(slot->passwd, &ask, sizeof(char));
00517                     slot->passwd = (char *)realloc(slot->passwd, psize);
00518                     memcpy(slot->passwd, pack+sizeof(char), psize);
00519                     slot->pw_len = sizeof(char)+psize;
00520                     //free(pack);
00521                     FB(1);
00522                 }else{
00523                     if(_mf == NULL)break;
00524                     _mf = _mf->next;
00525                     while ( _mf ){                        
00526                        // printf("format:%s\n", _mf->format);
00527                         Socket_Send(ffd, _mf->format, _mf->format_len);
00528                         _mf = _mf->next;
00529                     }                    
00530                     FB(0);
00531                 }*/
00532                 break;            
00533             case 'S':
00534                 /* if(slot->backend_fd != 0){
00535                 if(_mf){
00536                     if(_mf->format)
00537                         printf("_mf:%s\n", _mf->format);
00538                     _mf = _mf->next;
00539                     if(_mf) printf("yes _mf\n");
00540                 }
00541                 printf("s\n"); 
00542                 }*/
00543                 type = 1;
00544                 FB(type);
00545                 break;
00546             
00547             case 'K':
00548                 type = 1;
00549                 FB(type);
00550                 break;
00551             case 'C':
00552                 
00553                 break;
00554             case 'Z':
00555                 //if(slot->backend_fd == 0)
00556                  //   slot->backend_fd = bfd; 
00557                 type = 0;
00558                 FB(type);
00559                 break;
00560             
00561             case 'Q':   
00562                 q = 1;
00563                 type = 1;
00564                 FB(type);
00565                 break;
00566 
00567             case 'T':
00568                 type = 1;       
00569                 FB(type);
00570                 break;
00571             case 'X':
00572                 return 0;
00573                 
00574             default:    
00575                 
00576                 break;
00577         }                               /* -----  end switch  ----- */
00578 
00579     }
00580 }

00582 /*
00583  * pg to client
00584  */
00585 int PGAuthenticationOk(int fd, char *pack){
00586     char *newbuf;
00587     size_t msg_len, psize, plen, res_len;
00588     uint32 msg, res;
00589 
00590     if(pack == NULL) {
00591         d_log("pack calloc error !\n");
00592         return -1;
00593     }
00594 
00595     psize = sizeof(char);
00596     plen = Socket_Read(fd, pack, psize);
00597     if(plen != sizeof(char)) return -1;
00598         
00599     if(memcmp(pack, "R", sizeof(char)) != 0) return -1;
00600 
00601     newbuf = realloc(pack, psize);
00602     if(newbuf){
00603             pack = newbuf;
00604     } else return -1;
00605 
00606     msg_len = Socket_Read(fd, pack+sizeof(char), sizeof(uint32));
00607 
00608     if(msg_len != sizeof(uint32)) return -1;
00609 
00610     memcpy(&msg, pack+sizeof(char), sizeof(uint32));
00611 
00612     msg = ntohl(msg);
00613     psize += msg;
00614     newbuf = realloc(pack, psize);
00615     if(newbuf){
00616             pack = newbuf;
00617     } else return -1;
00618 
00619     res_len = Socket_Read(fd, pack+sizeof(char)+sizeof(uint32), msg-sizeof(uint32));
00620     //printf("res_len:%d\n", res_len);
00621     memcpy(&res, pack+sizeof(char)+sizeof(uint32), msg-sizeof(uint32));
00622     res = ntohl(res);
00623      
00624     return psize;
00625 
00626 }
00627 /* 
00628  * client to pg
00629  * */
00630 int PGPasswordMessage(int fd, char *pack){
00631     char *newbuf;
00632     size_t pv_len;
00633     uint32 len;
00634 
00635     if(pack == NULL) {
00636         d_log("pack calloc error !\n");
00637         return -1;
00638     }
00639 
00640     pv_len = Socket_Read(fd, pack, sizeof(char));
00641     if(pv_len != sizeof(char)) return -1;
00642     
00643     if(memcmp(pack, "p", sizeof(char)) != 0)return -1;
00644 
00645     pv_len = Socket_Read(fd, pack+sizeof(char), sizeof(uint32));
00646     if(pv_len != sizeof(uint32)) return -1;
00647 
00648    
00649     memcpy(&len, pack+sizeof(char), sizeof(uint32));
00650 
00651     len = ntohl(len);
00652 
00653     newbuf = realloc(pack, len+sizeof(char));
00654     if(newbuf){
00655         pack = newbuf;
00656     }else return -1;
00657 
00658     pv_len = Socket_Read(fd, pack+sizeof(char)+sizeof(uint32), len-sizeof(uint32));
00659     //printf("passwd:%s\n", pack+sizeof(char)+sizeof(uint32));
00660     if(pv_len == (len-sizeof(uint32))){
00661         return sizeof(char)+len;
00662     }
00663     
00664     return -1;
00665 
00666 }

00668 /*
00669  * pg to client
00670  */
00671 int PGAuthenticationMD5Password(int fd, char *pack){
00672     char *newbuf ,*encry;
00673     size_t psize, cmd_size, total_size, auth_size, encry_size;
00674     uint32 total, auth;
00675 
00676     if(pack == NULL) {
00677         d_log("pack calloc error !\n");
00678         return -1;
00679     }
00680     
00681     psize = sizeof(char);
00682     cmd_size = Socket_Read(fd, pack, psize);
00683     if(cmd_size != sizeof(char)) return -1;
00684         
00685     if(memcmp(pack, "R", sizeof(char)) != 0) return -1;
00686     
00687     newbuf = realloc(pack, psize+sizeof(uint32));
00688     if(newbuf){
00689             pack = newbuf;
00690     } else return -1;
00691 
00692     total_size = Socket_Read(fd, pack+psize, sizeof(uint32));
00693 
00694     if(total_size != sizeof(uint32)) return -1;
00695 
00696     memcpy(&total, pack+sizeof(char), sizeof(uint32));
00697 
00698     total = ntohl(total);
00699 
00700     psize += total;
00701     newbuf = realloc(pack, psize);
00702     if(newbuf){
00703             pack = newbuf;
00704     } else return -1;
00705 
00706     auth_size = Socket_Read(fd, pack+sizeof(char)+sizeof(uint32), sizeof(uint32));
00707     //printf("res_len:%d\n", res_len);
00708      memcpy(&auth, pack+sizeof(char)+sizeof(uint32), sizeof(uint32));
00709      auth = ntohl(auth);
00710      //printf("auth:%d\n", auth);
00711    
00712      
00713     encry_size = Socket_Read(fd, pack+sizeof(char)+sizeof(uint32)+sizeof(uint32), total-sizeof(uint32)-sizeof(uint32));
00714     /*printf("encry_size:%d\n", encry_size);
00715     memcpy(&encry, pack+sizeof(char)+sizeof(uint32)+sizeof(uint32), total-sizeof(uint32)-sizeof(uint32));
00716     printf("encry:%s\n", pack+sizeof(char)+sizeof(uint32)+sizeof(uint32));*/
00717 
00718      
00719     return psize;
00720 }
00721 
00722 int PGParameterStatus(int fd, char *pack){
00723     char *newbuf, *p;
00724     size_t psize, cmd_size, total_size, name_size, encry_size;
00725     uint32 total, encry;
00726 
00727     if(pack == NULL) {
00728         d_log("pack calloc error !\n");
00729         return -1;
00730     }
00731     
00732     psize = sizeof(char);
00733     cmd_size = Socket_Read(fd, pack, psize);
00734     if(cmd_size != sizeof(char)) return -1;
00735         
00736     if(memcmp(pack, "S", sizeof(char)) != 0) return -1;
00737     
00738     newbuf = realloc(pack, psize+sizeof(uint32));
00739     if(newbuf){
00740             pack = newbuf;
00741     } else return -1;
00742 
00743     total_size = Socket_Read(fd, pack+psize, sizeof(uint32));
00744 
00745     if(total_size != sizeof(uint32)) return -1;
00746     memcpy(&total, pack+sizeof(char), sizeof(uint32));
00747 
00748     total = ntohl(total);
00749 
00750     psize += total;
00751     newbuf = realloc(pack, psize);
00752     if(newbuf){
00753             pack = newbuf;
00754     } else return -1;
00755 
00756     name_size = Socket_Read(fd, pack+sizeof(char)+sizeof(uint32), total-sizeof(uint32));
00757 
00758     return psize;
00759 }

00844 int PGSimpleQuery(int fd, char *pack){
00845     char *newbuf;
00846     size_t psize, cmd_size, total_size, name_size, encry_size;
00847     uint32 total, encry;
00848 
00849     if(pack == NULL) {
00850         d_log("pack calloc error !\n");
00851         return -1;
00852     }
00853     
00854     psize = sizeof(char);
00855     cmd_size = Socket_Read(fd, pack, psize);
00856     if(cmd_size != sizeof(char)) return -1;
00857         
00858     if(memcmp(pack, "Q", sizeof(char)) != 0) return -1;
00859     
00860     newbuf = realloc(pack, psize+sizeof(uint32));
00861     if(newbuf){
00862             pack = newbuf;
00863     } else return -1;
00864 
00865     total_size = Socket_Read(fd, pack+psize, sizeof(uint32));
00866 
00867     if(total_size != sizeof(uint32)) return -1;
00868     memcpy(&total, pack+sizeof(char), sizeof(uint32));
00869 
00870     total = ntohl(total);
00871 
00872     psize += total;
00873     newbuf = realloc(pack, psize);
00874     if(newbuf){
00875             pack = newbuf;
00876     } else return -1;
00877 
00878     name_size = Socket_Read(fd, pack+sizeof(char)+sizeof(uint32), total-sizeof(uint32));
00879 
00880     return psize;
00881 
00882 }
